entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
